description: Moves the center of a dataset (DSET) to the center of a base volume (BASE) and optionally creates a transform matrix.

base.title: Base Volume
base.description: Base volume, typically a template. Can also specify RAI coordinates for center alignment.

dset.title: Dataset
dset.description: Dataset to be aligned to BASE.

children.title: Child Datasets
children.description: Additional datasets (originally in register with DSET) that should be shifted in the same way.

echo.title: Echo Flag
echo.description: Echo all commands to terminal for debugging.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Custom prefix for the result files.

matrix_only.title: 1D Matrix Only Flag
matrix_only.description: Only output the transform needed to align the centers without shifting any child volumes.

matrix_only_no_dset.title: 1D Matrix Only No Dataset Flag
matrix_only_no_dset.description: Like -1Dmat_only, but no datasets are created or changed.

no_cp.title: No Copy Flag
no_cp.description: Do not create new data; shift existing ones. Use with caution.

center_grid.title: Center Grid Flag
center_grid.description: Center is that of the volume's grid (default).

center_cm.title: Center of Mass Flag
center_cm.description: Center is the center of mass of the volume.

center_cm_no_amask.title: Center of Mass No Automask Flag

shift_xform.title: Shift Transform File
shift_xform.description: Apply shift translation from a 1D file.

shift_xform_inv.title: Shift Transform Inverse File
shift_xform_inv.description: Apply inverse of shift translation from a 1D file.
